tool.help:
============ iReport ============
iReport is a tool for the easy creation of HTML reports from Galaxy datasets. Ideal to use as final step in a pipeline to display all results in a single, interactive report.
**What's new**
- MarkDown support - HTML content item type - Link to download entire iReport on cover page
**How to use**
- Specify report title and cover image (url) - Add any number of named tabs - Add content items to each tab
1. Text Field 2. Text File 3. PDF File 4. HTML File 5. Table 6. Image File 7. Links (URL/dataset) 8. Links to all files in an archive dataset
**Example History**
http://galaxy-demo.trait-ctmm.cloudlet.sara.nl/u/saskia-hiltemann/h/gcc2014-ireport-about-ireport
